short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applies a blur onto the most recent messages displayed in your contact list, hover to reveal message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It hides your most recent messages in your contact list from direct view by applying a blur effect. The original message can be viewed by hovering over it.
